attributes.action: None Of The Above. a little box on Ballot that could bring a major difference to our leaders approach to policy
attributes.additional_details:
At every General election there are a Majority that are unrepresented and have to face the consequences of which every ideology currently in Number ten and parliament. I believe that there should be an option on every Ballot paper at General and Local elections.
None of the Above , A box below the parties but a counted vote announced with every other result in every constituency . It Would be a simple change to our voting system that would mean those of us who feel unrepresented in any way finally have a voice.
If Democracy is to be truly representative then giving people the chance to say this is essential.
Political parties would then have constant awareness that in fact there is a majority out there who didn't vote for them and therefore they need to think more deeply and with a wider and more long term view to policy and its repercussions to us all..
